name: GetMileagePricesById
description: Use this endpoint to load a single Mileage entry prices by id/number.

$ul:
**costPrice**: The total cost of the trip, calculated based on the mileage cost rates.

Read-only: true

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**costRate**: The cost of the trip per mile, provided by the mileage setup.

Read-only: true

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**number**: The mileage entry identifier.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true

**salesPrice**: The total sales price of the trip, calculated based on the mileage sales rates.

Read-only: true

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**salesRate**: The sales price of the trip per mile, provided by the mileage setup.

Read-only: true

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**errorCode**: The error code.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**logTimeUtc**: The UTC time of the error being logged.
